company_description: VOI Technology is a micro-mobility startup that provides electric scooters for last-mile transportation. They create a system of electrically powered scooters around urban centers to provide a way to commute while helping people to reduce their carbon footprint and cities to have a more sustainable transportation network.
founders: Adam Jafer, Douglas Stark, Filip Lindvall, Fredrik Hjelm, Johan Pietil√§ Holmner, Keith Richman
universities: KTH, Upsala, Stockholm School of Economics
embedding_text: VOI Technology is a micro-mobility startup that provides electric scooters for last-mile transportation. They create a system of electrically powered scooters around urban centers to provide a way to commute while helping people to reduce their carbon footprint and cities to have a more sustainable transportation network.
